channel.title: PyTorch on Daiwei Chen
channel.description: Recent content in PyTorch on Daiwei Chen

item.title: PyTorch tricks
item.description: 1. Categorical Reparameterization with Gumbel-Softmax (create categorical variables in neural networks) # Background: Discrete variables are important in neural networks. E.g. discrete variables have been used to learn probabilistic latent representations that correspond to distinct semantic classes.

item.title: Coding Practice
item.description: Some coding practice about multiple users metric learning and preference learning. ChenDaiwei-99/multiuser-metric-preference Paper code for “One for All: Simultaneous Metric and Preference Learning over Multiple Users” Jupyter Notebook 0 0
